column2: `summarise()` has grouped output by 'weathersit'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
ggtitle("Average Bike Rentals by Weather Condition during the 9 AM hour \nin Washington, DC (2011-12)",
subtitle = "Faceted according to whether it is a working day") +
labs(x = "Weather situation code", y = "Average bike rentals (count)",

caption = "Figure 7. x-axis represent weather situation code, which has the following values: – 1: Clear, Few clouds, Partly cloudy, Partly cloudy – 2: Mist + Cloudy, Mist + Broken clouds, Mist + Few clouds, Mist – 3: Light Snow, Light Rain + Thunderstorm + Scattered clouds, Light Rain + Scattered clouds – 4: Heavy Rain + Ice Pallets + Thunderstorm + Mist, Snow + Fog y-axis represent average ridership during the 9 AM hour.") +
